Author: missalligator
Text: Hot tea and lots of water will help it digest quicker. I try to stand or walk a little while studying (flashcards or a book) to distract myself from how my stomach feels. Good luck with your finals! Youâ€™ll get through this!

Author: shortLavender
Text: Try to focus on the fact that it was brain food. Finals time is no time for a foggy mind or short temper. It's not much longer until break, you got this!
